analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#65-67) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#68-73)
Airdrop.ecrecovery (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#470-503) is declared view but contains assembly code

HODLIT.registerEtherBalance (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#302-314) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.balance > 200000000000000000 && etherBalances[msg.sender] == 0 && _referral != msg.sender)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol:
	Contract HODLIT has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#295)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Airdrop.claim (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#557-571):
	External calls:
	- token.ICDClaims(userAddress) (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#564-571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol)
	- claimedBy (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol)
	- claims (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol)
	- isClaimed (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol)
	- totalClaims (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol)

Airdrop.ecrecovery uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#470-503)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xa783b02ce5853ad798b6fd0417c729cc462328df.sol#488-497
